verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* \w art|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* God; early \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H1961"\w* seek thee: \w my|strong="H1732"\w* soul thirsteth \w for|strong="H1961"\w* thee, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* flesh longeth \w for|strong="H1961"\w* thee, \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dry \w and|strong="H3063"\w* weary land, where \w no|strong="H1961"\w* water \w is|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1097"\w* \w have|strong="H4325"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* looked upon thee \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H1097"\w* sanctuary, \w to|strong="H4325"\w* see \w thy|strong="H4325"\w* power \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w thy|strong="H4325"\w* glory.
\w For|strong="H3651"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* lovingkindness \w is|strong="H3651"\w* better than life; \w my|strong="H7200"\w* lips \w shall|strong="H5797"\w* praise \w thee|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2617"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* bless \w thee|strong="H2896"\w* \w while|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2617"\w* lift up \w my|strong="H3588"\w* hands \w in|strong="H2896"\w* \w thy|strong="H7623"\w* name.

\w My|strong="H5375"\w* soul \w shall|strong="H2416"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* satisfied \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w with|strong="H3651"\w* marrow \w and|strong="H3709"\w* fatness; \w and|strong="H3709"\w* \w my|strong="H5375"\w* mouth \w shall|strong="H2416"\w* \w praise|strong="H1288"\w* \w thee|strong="H1288"\w* \w with|strong="H3651"\w* joyful lips;

\w When|strong="H3644"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* remember thee \w upon|strong="H7646"\w* \w my|strong="H5315"\w* bed, \add and \add*meditate \w on|strong="H6310"\w* thee \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* night watches.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* thou hast \w been|strong="H2142"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* help, \w and|strong="H2142"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H2142"\w* wings will \w I|strong="H5921"\w* rejoice.
\w My|strong="H1961"\w* soul followeth hard \w after|strong="H1961"\w* thee: thy right hand upholdeth \w me|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3225"\w* \w those|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* seek \w my|strong="H8551"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w to|strong="H5315"\w* destroy \w it|strong="H5315"\w*, \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* go into \w the|strong="H8551"\w* lower parts \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H8551"\w* earth.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* given over \w to|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H1245"\w* power \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H1245"\w* sword: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* portion \w for|strong="H5315"\w* foxes.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H2719"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*: every \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3027"\w* sweareth \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H2719"\w* glory; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mouth \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3027"\w* speak \w lies|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H2719"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* stopped.
